title: "Seamless" experience to register my drone on DigitalSky India.
selftext:
​

[What is the valid password format then?](https://preview.redd.it/0p9rki0ge7ob1.png?width=1166&format=png&auto=webp&s=639554718f404aa5e50303571cdfbcfe0d4b5894)

Me: \*creates password\*

Digital Sky: INVALID FORMAT!

Me: \*creates stronger password\*

Digital Sky: INVALID FORMAT!

Me: \*creates password with different numbers and symbols\*

Digital Sky: INVALID FORMAT!

Me: What is the valid format then???

Digital Sky: ...

​

I tried many formats - symbols, numbers, arrangements, caps, all for DigiSky to say its invalid.

Any help in the comments is appreciated.
comments: Contact them? Should have an email
Try just alphabets, around 10-15 letters. I know stupid, but completely possible from government.

You can practice setting a password here [https://neal.fun/password-game/](https://neal.fun/password-game/)

If you're able to set a password here, you'll find every other password simple.
Are you using a mobile app? If yes, try using a browser to just set up the account and password.
